cbbg.command.format.rgba8_not_selectable: rgba8 is no longer selectable; use rgba16f or rgba32f (RGBA8 is used only as an automatic fallback).
cbbg.command.stbn.depth.invalid_pow2: Depth must be power of two (8, 16, 32...)
cbbg.command.stbn.size.invalid_pow2: Size must be power of two (16, 32, 64...)
cbbg.config.confirm.regenerate_stbn.mess:
This will regenerate the STBN noise textures with:

Size: %1$s
Depth: %2$s
Seed: %3$s

This may take a moment.
cbbg.config.depth.label: Depth
cbbg.config.mode.tooltip.enabled: Full color bit-depth reduction with STBN dithering.
cbbg.config.seed.label: Seed
cbbg.config.size.label: Size
cbbg.config.status.disabled_render_error: ⚠ cbbg disabled due to render error (see log)
cbbg.config.status.mode_disabled: cbbg is disabled (enable Mode to edit settings)
cbbg.config.status.no_float_formats: ⚠ No RGBA16F/32F support: stuck on RGBA8
cbbg.config.strength.label: Strength
cbbg.config.title: cbbg config
cbbg.config.tooltip.generate_stbn: Regenerates noise textures (after confirmation). May take a moment.
cbbg.config.tooltip.stbn_depth:
Noise texture depth (number of frames).
Must be a power of two.

Higher values reduce temporal repetition but use more memory and may take longer to generate.
Range: 8-128
cbbg.config.tooltip.stbn_seed:
Seed used for noise generation.

Changing this will produce a different dithering pattern.
Only integers are accepted.
cbbg.config.tooltip.stbn_size:
Noise texture size (width/height).
Must be a power of two.

Larger values reduce visible repetition but use more memory and may take longer to generate.
Range: 16-256
cbbg.config.tooltip.strength:
Controls dithering intensity.

1.00 is the default. Higher values increase dithering strength.
Range: 0.50-4.00
cbbg.toast.stbn.title: cbbg Generation
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.cbbg: color banding be gone - Remove pesky color banding from Minecraft
